Expr: Binary   : Rc<Expr> left, Token operator, Rc<Expr> right
Call     : Rc<Expr> callee, Token paren, Rc<Vec<Rc<Expr>>> args
Logic    : Rc<Expr> left, Token operator, Rc<Expr> right
Stmt: ForStmt     : Rc<Option<Rc<Stmt>>> init, Rc<Option<Rc<Expr>>> condition, Rc<Option<Rc<Expr>>> inc, Rc<Stmt> block
FunStmt     : Token name, Rc<Vec<Token>> params, Rc<Stmt> body
